attributes.action: reinstate the mentality of people improving themselves rather than dragging "richer" people down to the same level
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is a disturbing trend of attacking people who are "better off". If this continues, then EVERYBODY will be poor.
Surely, it is better to encourage people to improve themselves and demonstrate that whatever they achieve will not be confiscated by the State.
